resources.string:
Human Design is the newest system for
self-discovery

This is a tool that allows to explore your
true nature, discover your unique
characteristics and learn how to make
the right decisions.

Human Design helps to build a
harmonious relationship with yourself
and the world around you. It gives
recommendations how to unlock your
potential and self-realization.

Human design is not a religion or
philosophical doctrine, but a separate
modern system of knowledge at the
intersection of science and spirituality.

Human Design has collected such
knowledge as the Chinese I Ching, the
Hindu chakra system, Kaballah, astrology,
quantum physics and genetics.

With the help of Human Design, you will
learn how you can live your life without
playing other people\'s roles.

What would you like
to get using
Human Design?

Your answers will help us find a more
personalized approach for you.

Your answers will help us choose a
personal approach.

I didn\'t know anything
about Human Design

I understand a little
about this system

Please allow us to track application usage. It is
important for us, so that we can:

- Personalize your experience of using the App
- Invite users similar to you to the App
- Send individual offers especially for you

These parameters can always be changed in the
"settings" of your device.

In Human Design, personality analysis is
carried out on the basis of a bodygraph,
the so-called Rave Card.

An individual Rave Card (bodygraph)
contains a schematic image of energy
centers, channels and gates that reflect
the personal energy mechanics of each
person, as well as the algorithm of its
work.

To calculate a personal Rave Card
(bodygraph), you need to fill in the data
and answer a few questions.

Let‚Äôs get acquainted! Please introduce
yourself so that we know how best to
address you!

, enter the date of birth,
and we will calculate your personal
bodygraph!

The place where you were born is very
important. We will be able to accurately
determine the position of the heavenly
bodies that have left an imprint on your
destiny.
The next affirmation will be tomorrow
the next transit will be tomorrow
Channels are bridges that connect all the active centers within your design. Here you will find the descriptions of the most important aspects of your life.
The gates are a personal feature of your character, showing the potential that you can discover in yourself, making certain decisions every day.

Defined centers perform the functions assigned to them. This is what is determined in you from the birth, this is consistent energy by which you are recognized. From here you are broadcasting your energy out into the world, influencing and inspiring others. It is what is fixed and reliable within you.

Undefined centers are open to influence from the outside, these are places where you are designed to be receptive from people and life. These are places of vulnerability and sensitivity where the world affects you.
In this section, you can add bodygraphs of other people (friends, acquaintances) and get to know them from a completely new side
The introduction of new data will lead to the fact that your design will irreversibly change. Are you sure you want to change the data?
Now you can reveal all the secrets of your relationship and learn to live in harmony.

resources.string: Compatibility channels demonstrate how people influence each other. When overlaying rave cards of two persons, we can see if you and your partner have completely or partially matching Channels. Based on this, it is concluded whether your relationship will be harmonious.
